name: Chambre de commerce et d'industrie de région Bourgogne Franche-Comté
membership:
- Member of the ENTERPRISE EUROPE NETWORK
- Member of the French Chamber of Commerce and Industry network (ACFCI)
goal:
-Defence of the interests of companies established in the region
- Economic Development
- Promotion of policies implemented by the European Union
- Support for development of business relationships with established company in the 27 Member States of the European Union
interests: Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Food Safety, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Fiscalité, fonds structurels, droit, innovation, développement des entreprises, développement international, numérique
